title: Apple Reportedly Not Planning to Release USB-C Version of AirPods 3
content:
Apple has no plans to release a new version of the third-generation AirPods with a USB-C port, despite doing so with a new version of the second-generation AirPods Pro later this year, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo today said.

Image via Ken Pillonel

In a tweet, Kuo explained that Apple "currently appears to have no plans for USB-C versions of the AirPods 2 & 3." Kuo's comment likely suggests that Apple is holding off for the fourth-generation AirPods to offer a USB-C port on the device.

The decision is notable since Apple is apparently planning to release a revised version of the second-generation ‌AirPods Pro‌ later this year with a USB-C port.

More to follow...
Tag: Ming-Chi Kuo

This article, "Apple Reportedly Not Planning to Release USB-C Version of AirPods 3" first appeared on MacRumors.com
